title: Beautiful Studios Near UNLV School of Dentistry- Lots of Cabinet Space
map_address: 501 S. 10th St. OFC near Clark Ave & 10th Street
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'We don’t just rent apartments, we create homes!', 'From the moment you walk through the front doors of Stax Studios you will be part of a unique community.', 'Completely renovated, Stax Studios features cutting edge amenities, meticulously-groomed grounds, and a professionally dedicated staff who ensure you have a higher standard of living.', 'Convenient shopping, near Fremont Street, and located in Downtown Las Vegas … everything (and we mean everything) is at your fingertips!', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'October 7, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Dogs Allowed: Restrictions may apply•$25 Monthly Pet Rent•2 Pet LimitCats, Birds, Fish, Reptiles and Other Pets Allowed•$25 Monthly Pet Rent•2 Pet Limit', 'Deposit:', '$250 OAC', 'Leasing options:', '6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months', 'Leasing notes:', 'Application fee:', '$50 Per Adult 18 and Over', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Internet', 'Utilities Cost:', 'Laundry:', 'Shared', 'Parking type:', 'Off-Street, On-Street', 'Parking notes:', '$25', 'Appliances:', 'Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven', 'Exterior:', 'Balcony/patio, Sprinkler system', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Air conditioning', 'Wiring:', 'High-speed internet', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Barbecue, Courtyard', 'Security and Access:', 'Gated entry, Disability access', 'Views:', 'City', 'Additional features:', 'Hardwood floor, Granite countertop', 'Offered by:', 'Stax', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
